Articles.Content: Hi all! I just had a creative burst revolving around my favorite little space station. Having fleshed out some of the specifics, and spent a couple of hours hunting down the stats such as how much fuel it took to get into orbit, or how much it cost to build, I threw together this nifty little stat sheet. Hope someone out there gets as much enjoyment out of it as I did!
This is actually pretty cool! I like the the lay out of the station.
